div.p: RECUSANTS ſuch perſons as acknow!edge the pope to be the ſupreme head of the church, and re-fuſe to acknowledge the king’s ſupremacy ; who are hence called Popiſh recufants. The penal laws againſt Papiſts are now aboliſhed in Britain and in Ireland ; and in all probability they will quickly be allowed the am· pleſt privileges.
